statements.sql: select empleado.nombre,empleado.apellido,empleado.id as idEmpleado, perfil.id as idPerfil, perfil.nombre as nombreperfil, cargo.nombre as cargo from empleado,users,perfil,cargo where empleado.idCargo=cargo.id and empleado.id=users.idEmpleado and users.idPerfil=perfil.id and empleado.deleted_at IS NULL and users.email="admin"

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan
